attributes.contentHtml:
The only time I've seen him rewrite any code after getting it from ptero market or github is if it no longer works. Willypro made an egg that allowed for a VPS in pterodactyl. Willypro had a IP whitelist in the egg so that people couldn't pirate his egg (it later turned out he got this code from github)

LocalHost ended up removing the IP whitelist and selling it, but thats around the only time he's done anything

attributes.bio: Setting the facts straight and exposing companies in my free time :D

attributes.title: pterodactyl-addons.com is scammer and selling leaked/ pirated ptero resources
